inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSecurityGroup.

filters.description: Custom filter block as described below.

id.description: Id of the specific security group to retrieve.

name.description:
Name of the field to filter by, as defined by
[the underlying AWS API](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeSecurityGroups.html).

tags.description:
Map of tags, each pair of which must exactly match
a pair on the desired security group.

vpcId.description:
Id of the VPC that the desired security group belongs to.

More complex filters can be expressed using one or more `filter` sub-blocks,
which take the following arguments:

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSecurityGroup.

arn.description: Computed ARN of the security group.
